query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS churn_risk_scores (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  risk_score INTEGER NOT NULL,
  risk_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  engagement_score INTEGER,
  days_since_activity INTEGER,
  activity_rate DECIMAL(10,2),
  calculated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
  UNIQUE(user_id, platform)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bdzn41uM6mMWcv.97707ddd6929 --database 3gcYftfyZmb2335Uoynmho --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS churn_risk_scores (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  risk_score INTEGER NOT NULL,
  risk_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  engagement_score INTEGER,
  days_since_activity INTEGER,
  activity_rate DECIMAL(10,2),
  calculated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
  UNIQUE(user_id, platform)
);
